alert_data.description: Database connection pool has reached maximum capacity. New connection requests are timing out.

logs:
[2026-02-17 08:15:29] ERROR [user-service] java.sql.SQLTransientConnectionException: HikariPool-1 - Connection is not available, request timed out after 30000ms
[2026-02-17 08:15:30] WARN [api-gateway] Database connection pool exhausted (95/100 active connections)

root_causes: Connection pool size insufficient for current load
Possible connection leak in application code
mitigation_steps: Investigate application code for connection leaks
ground_truth.actual_root_cause: Traffic spike combined with long-running analytics queries
